content: DWP 15-22 Water tank Battery-powered water supply tank for wet cutting/coring (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Water management systems and water tanks- - - ### FEATURES:Features Get more done per tank – water flow responds automatically to the opening and closing of the water valve on the tool, significantly reducing wasted water and interruptions to refill the tank Easier to transport – telescopic handle and large, rugged wheels make this water pump easier to move around your jobsite One-for-all versatility – engineered to provide a constant water flow suitable for use with all Hilti cut-off saws and core drills Easy to use – two-button control panel with low-battery indicator On the Nuron battery platform – cordless tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Supplying water for wet cutting with electric or gas cut-off saws Supplying water for wet coring using rig-mounted or handheld core drills Drilling, cutting and demolition work where access to a continuous water supply is limited ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Water supply hoses Water pressure: N/A psi A-weighted emission sound power level: 89 dB (A) Technical Data | Accessory type | Water supply hoses | Water pressure | N/A psi | A-weighted emission sound power level | 89 dB (A) | 1 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2315588 - Water supply unit DWP 15-22 - Package Size 1 pc
